archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: 1. Google (2025). Machine families resource and comparison guide. (Web) https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/machine-resource 1. Grafana Labs (2025). Response Times: The 3 Important Limits. (Web) https://www.nngroup.com/articles/response-times-3-important-limits/
